type: public works and government services canada
description: Statistics Canada is looking to procure custom cryogenic labels to cover 6 months of operation (150,300 labels), with the option to extend the contract three additional times over the next year and a half (601,200 labels).
full_summary:
### **Public Printing Services Tender Announcement**

[**Business Name**]: Statistics Canada (StatCan)

[**Contracting Entity:**](#contracting-entity) Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Request for Proposal

Requestors are seeking a Proposal to procure custom-printed cryogenic labels to cover a period of 6 month operation with the option of extending the contract three additional times. 

#### **Project Requirements**

- [**Total Number:**](#required-total-number) 151,500 labelled
- [**Label Description:**](#label-description) Provided in Annex A, Statement of Work

#### **Contract Duration**

The period of the Contract is from Contract Award to September 30, 2023 inclusive.

#### **Option Periods**

- [**Number of Periods:**](#option-periods) Three (3), six-month option periods

#### **Contract Requirements**

- [**Trade Agreements:**](#contract-trade-agreements) Offerors must operate within the framework of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
- [**Business Operations:**](#contract-business-operations) Only Canadian services are accepted.

#### **Selection Criteria**

- [**Contract Award Criteria:**](#contract-selection-criteria) Lowest Price Quote

#### **Proposal Submission**

- [**Submission Date and Time:**](#proposal-submission) 2023-07-14 at 14:00:00. Extensions will not be accepted.
- [**Contact Information:**](#important-contact-information) Mr. Leblanc, Marc-Andre, PSPC (SPAC) at: marc-andre.leblanc@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### **About the Contracting Entity** 

[**Name of Contracting Entity**]: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

[**Submission Address**]: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, Canada K1A 0S5

Please [ ]visit Government Tenders' Website for Additional Information about this solicitation and other contracts available

### Annex A, Statement of Work

Found in the Request for Proposal Document available on the Government Tenders' Website.
